holidays.title: National Common Courtesy Day
holidays.description: With ever-busy lives, we often forget that simple things can make a difference.

holidays.title: World Poetry Day
holidays.description: “How do I love thee? Let me count the ways.”

holidays.title: Afghanistan Day
holidays.description: Beyond the news and popular media, discover Afghanistan through culture and tradition.

holidays.title: Big Bang Day
holidays.description: Space nerds and science geeks gather for one of their most iconic commemorations.

holidays.title: Credit Card Reduction Day
holidays.description: Spend a little wisely this Credit Card Reduction Day. Learn all there is to know!

holidays.title: Education Freedom Day
holidays.description: In keeping with the day’s spirit, let’s learn and learn some more.

holidays.title: Egypt Mother's Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the love, and honor the sacrifices a mother makes for her children, family, and society.

holidays.title: Harmony Day
holidays.description: We’ve got harmonious habits and unifying ideas to make your Harmony Day a picture of peace.

holidays.title: Human Rights Day South Africa
holidays.description: To know your rights is to be empowered: Let’s celebrate Human Rights Day South Africa!

holidays.title: International Colour Day
holidays.description: We cannot imagine a world without color so let’s join in this celebration of beauty!

holidays.title: International Day for the Elimination of Racial Discrimination
holidays.description: Uprooting strongholds of racism and mobilizing a united front, observe this day with us right here.

holidays.title: International Day of Nowruz
holidays.description: Spring’s grand return. Celebrate International Day of Nowruz in style!

holidays.title: International Race Relations Day
holidays.description: This International Race Relations Day, let’s foster a global culture of equality and tolerance.

holidays.title: Martyrdom of Imam Ali
holidays.description: Let’s take a look at one of Islam’s important holidays this Martyrdom of Imam Ali Day.

holidays.title: Memory Day
holidays.description: Grab a notebook and throw it out the window — today's challenge is remembering without a reminder.

holidays.title: Namibia Independence Day
holidays.description: It’s a good day to join the people of Namibia as they celebrate their country’s independence.

holidays.title: National Aries Day
holidays.description: National Aries Day on March 21 celebrates people born between March 21 and April 19.

holidays.title: National Beverly Day
holidays.description: For all the Beverlys out there, your name reflects a beautiful balance in nature.

holidays.title: National California Strawberry Day
holidays.description: Sweet juicy heaven! Indulge in one of nature’s finest treats this National California Strawberry Day.

holidays.title: National Countdown Day
holidays.description: On National Countdown Day, count the seconds, minutes, or hours until something special happens.

holidays.title: National Crunchy Taco Day
holidays.description: Today is for the rough, rugged and crunchy.

holidays.title: National Day of Action Against Bullying and Violence
holidays.description: Let’s all prepare to join forces to create long-term solutions to bullying!

holidays.title: National Day Of Action On Syringe Exchange
holidays.description: This day is all about the life-saving importance of using sterile needles.

holidays.title: National Flower Day
holidays.description: Join us as we learn all about National Flower Day and how to celebrate it.

holidays.title: National Fragrance Day
holidays.description: One whiff of it puts us under a spell!

holidays.title: National French Bread Day
holidays.description: Indulge in this unique bread that is crunchy on the outside and delectably doughy inside.

holidays.title: National Healthy Fats Day
holidays.description: This National Healthy Fats Day, join us in saying yes to healthy fats!

holidays.title: National Peter Day
holidays.description: Peter is a well-known name that is associated with wealth and success.

holidays.title: National Preschool Teacher Appreciation Day
holidays.description: It's time to honor the preschool teachers who provide us with the tools of learning.

holidays.title: National Preschool Teachers Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Check out some inspiring ways to show preschool educators your admiration for them!

holidays.title: National Renewable Energy Day
holidays.description: Join the movement as we try to save our planet on National Renewable Energy Day.

holidays.title: National Single Parent Day
holidays.description: Single parents get to take a break from constantly holding down the fort!

holidays.title: National Teenager Day
holidays.description: Let us celebrate with today's teenagers because we were all teens once!

holidays.title: Race Relations Day
holidays.description: It’s time to say no to racial discrimination and join our hands in oneness and unity.

holidays.title: Rosie The Riveter Day
holidays.description: Raise your fist and strike a pose as we honor the women of past generations.

holidays.title: Slytherin Pride Day
holidays.description: It’s time to slither into the light as we mark Slytherin Pride Day in style.

holidays.title: Spring Fairy Fun Day
holidays.description: Put some flowers in your hair and spread joy on Spring Fairy Fun Day.

holidays.title: Twitter Day
holidays.description: Twitter, the world’s biggest microblogging site, was launched on March 21, 2006. In 16 short years, Twitter has become the standard medium for getting information…

holidays.title: Vermouth Day
holidays.description: Grab a bottle and make your favorite dish or cocktail as we celebrate this acclaimed drink.

holidays.title: WE Day
holidays.description: Strap on your thinking caps and let us all take part in empowering the youth!

holidays.title: World Down Syndrome Day
holidays.description: Raise public awareness, promote inclusivity, and support the wellbeing of those living with Down Syndrome.

holidays.title: World Forestry Day
holidays.description: Let us join hands and pledge to save our trees, our forests, and our planet!

holidays.title: World Puppetry Day
holidays.description: Learn all about the incredible art of puppetry this World Puppetry Day.

holidays.title: Nowruz Bayram
holidays.description: Come join us as we usher in Spring with a Persian-themed celebration befitting the occasion.

holidays.title: The Big Walk and Wheel
holidays.description: Feel free and ride your worries away on two wheels or in tandem.

holidays.title: Jace Norman’s Birthday
holidays.description: The teen star is making steady strides up the popularity charts with his shows and advocacy.

holidays.title: Shannade Clermont’s Birthday
holidays.description: This model and media star believes that self-confidence is a must to achieve success.

holidays.title: TINI’s Birthday
holidays.description: Singer, songwriter, dancer, model, actress, activist, philanthropist — there is little that TINI can’t do.
